messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] dreamers
messages.msgSnippet: ... Heather, that sounds like a good idea for some time in
messages.messageBody:
<< I think she just likes to dream.

<<She tells me she is always thinking of things like
this. >>


>Would she be interested in a dream journal? She could
>list and describe her inventions...or draw pictures of
>them?

Heather, that sounds like a good idea for some time in the future. If I gave her a journal now, she would think it was a school thing. She is starting to heal but is still very angry about what school has done to her. She says she thinks it ruined her and she hopes she will be able to get over it someday. I keep telling her we have only been homeschooling/unschooling for 5 months and look how much better she feels, just think how you will be in a year or two or three. Poor kid.

Pat


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: dreamers
messages.msgSnippet: Would she be interested in a dream journal?  She could list
messages.messageBody:
<< I think she just likes to dream.

<<She tells me she is always thinking of things like
this. >>


Would she be interested in a dream journal? She could
list and describe her inventions...or draw pictures of
them?

heather in tucson
